SELECT r.risk_no as riskNumber, r.risk_id as riskId, r.rsk_ttl as riskTitle, r.class_cd as classCode, r.stat_cd as statusCode, r.pri_cd as priorCode, r.risk_cont as riskContent, r.risk_plan as riskPlan, r.due_dt as dueDate, r.compl_dt as completeDate, r.prj_no as prjNo, r.sys_no as systemNo, r.mem_no as memberNo, m.mem_nm as memberName FROM risk r, member m WHERE r.type_cd = 'PMS00302' AND r.mem_no = m.mem_no AND r.risk_no = #{riskNo}
